Text: Please, next time specify that the movie ALREADY includes hardcoded subs for the non-english parts. Subs are pretty big and, as I said, hardcoded. So, for people who want a clean copy of these movies (using external subs only) this is not the best choice.
I appreciate the hardcoded english subs for non-english dialogue. Thank you!
